message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is a unique item that holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance and the potential it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects both the intrinsic value of the product and the chance for you to benefit from its worth. I trust this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.
